description: Main entry point for a Flutter application setting up providers and theming, including the root widget 'AppRoot' that initializes application-wide state and theme.

classes.name: AppRoot
classes.description: Root widget that sets up provider and theme for the Flutter app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that runs the Flutter app with the AppRoot widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, providing app-wide state and theme setup.
